title: 04/30/2021 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
itunes:title: 04/30/2021 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
description:
Chris Simms joins Dan to discuss last night's NFL Draft and the first round, as the San Francisco 49ers take Trey Lance. Dan also talks about the growing rift between Aaron Rodgers and the Green Bay Packers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
